name: Black Sword of War
book: Pathfinder Adventure Path #71: Rasputin Must Die! © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: piercing or slashing manufactured weapon touched
text:
This spell is available to followers of the Horseman of War.

The target weapon turns a glossy black color and deals bleed damage if it deals hit point damage to a creature. The amount of bleed damage is equal to 1/2 your caster level (maximum bleed 5).
target_zh: 接触到的穿刺或挥砍人造武器
text_zh: 如果目标武器能对生物造成生命值伤害，它会变成一把有光泽的黑剑并造成流血伤害。流血伤害的数量等于你施法者等级的1/2（流血伤害最高为5）。
